Utilities/RSVTranslationParser/RSVParser.py

00001 from BeautifulSoup import BeautifulSoup
00002 import urllib2
00003 import re
00004 
00005 index = urllib2.urlopen("http://quod.lib.umich.edu/r/rsv/browse.html")
00006 indexSoup = BeautifulSoup(index)
00007 baseUrl = "http://quod.lib.umich.edu"
00008 verseNumber = 0
00009 
00010 bibleFile = open("RSV.txt", "w")
00011 
00012 bible = []
00013 
00014 for relativeBookUrl in indexSoup.findAll(href=re.compile("^/cgi.*")):
00015     fullBookUrl = baseUrl + relativeBookUrl['href']
00016     book = urllib2.urlopen(fullBookUrl)
00017     bookSoup = BeautifulSoup(book)
00018     lines = str(bookSoup).split("<br />")
00019     header = lines[0].split("</h2>")[0]
00020     
00021     book = header.split("<h2>")[1]
00022     print "Getting book: " + book
00023 
00024     lines[0] = lines[0].split("</h2>")[1]
00025     chapter = 0
00026     for line in lines:
00027         verseNumber = verseNumber + 1
00028         if line.count("<h3>") > 0:
00029             chapter = chapter + 1
00030             verse = 0
00031 
00032         verse = verse + 1
00033         if line.count("]"):
00034             verseText = line.split("] ")[1]
00035 
00036             verseEntry = str(verseNumber) + "*" + book + "*" + str(chapter) + "*" + str(verse) + "*" + verseText
00037             bible.append(verseEntry)
00038 
00039 for line in bible:
00040     bibleFile.write(line + "\n")
00041 bibleFile.close()
